description.en: Master the fundamentals of permanent makeup with our comprehensive foundation course
description.vi: Làm chủ những kiến thức nền tảng về phun xăm thẩm mỹ với khóa học toàn diện
description.ja: 包括的な基礎コースでアートメイクの基礎をマスターしましょう
description.es: Domina los fundamentos del maquillaje permanente con nuestro curso integral
description.ko: 종합적인 기초 과정으로 반영구 화장의 기초를 마스터하세요

subtitle: Complete Foundation Training
introduction: Our PMU Foundation Course provides a comprehensive introduction to permanent makeup techniques, covering theory, safety protocols, and hands-on practice. Perfect for beginners looking to start their career in the beauty industry.

curriculum.name: Day 1: Theory & Safety
curriculum.description: Learn PMU fundamentals, color theory, skin anatomy, and sterilization protocols

curriculum.name: Day 2: Eyebrow Techniques
curriculum.description: Master microblading and powder brow techniques with practice on synthetic skin

curriculum.name: Day 3: Lip Procedures
curriculum.description: Learn lip blushing and full lip techniques, color selection, and numbing protocols

curriculum.name: Day 4: Eyeliner Methods
curriculum.description: Practice lash enhancement and classic eyeliner on models

curriculum.name: Day 5: Live Model Practice
curriculum.description: Work on live models under instructor supervision with certification exam

whyChooseUs: Small class sizes (maximum 4 students) for personalized attention
Internationally certified instructors with 10+ years experience
All training materials and tools included
Lifetime support and mentorship after graduation

title.ja: 高度なマイクロブレーディング

description.en: Advanced techniques for creating natural, hair-like strokes
description.vi: Kỹ thuật nâng cao tạo nét lông mày tự nhiên như thật
description.ja: 自然な毛並みを作る高度なテクニック
description.es: Técnicas avanzadas para crear trazos naturales similares al cabello
description.ko: 자연스러운 모발 같은 선을 만드는 고급 기술

subtitle: Master Natural Brow Artistry
introduction: Take your microblading skills to the next level with advanced stroke patterns, challenging skin types, and corrective techniques. This course is designed for PMU artists who want to refine their craft.

curriculum.name: Advanced Stroke Techniques
curriculum.description: Master various stroke patterns for different brow styles and face shapes

curriculum.name: Difficult Skin Types
curriculum.description: Learn to work with oily, mature, and scarred skin successfully

curriculum.name: Color Correction
curriculum.description: Fix old PMU work and correct unwanted pigmentation

curriculum.name: Business & Marketing
curriculum.description: Pricing strategies, client management, and social media marketing

whyChooseUs: Advanced color theory and pigment mixing

title.ja: オンブレパウダーブロウマスター

description.en: Learn the most popular brow technique with soft, powdered finish
description.vi: Học kỹ thuật phun mày phổ biến nhất với hiệu ứng phấn mềm mại
description.ja: 柔らかいパウダー仕上げの最も人気のある眉毛テクニックを学ぶ
description.es: Aprende la técnica de cejas más popular con acabado suave y en polvo
description.ko: 부드러운 파우더 마감의 가장 인기 있는 눈썹 기술을 배우세요

subtitle: Perfect Soft Shading Technique
introduction: Master the ombre powder brow technique that creates soft, makeup-like results. Learn gradient shading, saturation control, and how to achieve consistent, beautiful results on every client.

curriculum.name: Machine Technique Fundamentals
curriculum.description: Proper machine handling, needle selection, and depth control

curriculum.name: Gradient Shading
curriculum.description: Create perfect ombre effect from light to dark

curriculum.name: Brow Mapping & Design
curriculum.description: Advanced brow shaping for different face types

curriculum.name: Live Model Practice
curriculum.description: Perform complete ombre brow procedures on live models

title.ja: リップブラッシュトレーニング

description.en: Create beautiful, natural-looking lip color enhancement
description.vi: Tạo màu môi tự nhiên và quyến rũ
description.ja: 美しく自然な唇の色を作る
description.es: Crea un color de labios natural y hermoso

subtitle: Natural Lip Enhancement Specialist
introduction: Learn the art of lip blushing to create natural, enhanced lip color. This course covers color selection, lip anatomy, numbing techniques, and how to achieve symmetrical, beautiful results.

curriculum.name: Lip Anatomy & Safety
curriculum.description: Understanding lip structure, nerve locations, and safety protocols

curriculum.name: Color Theory for Lips
curriculum.description: Neutralizing techniques and custom color mixing

curriculum.name: Application Techniques
curriculum.description: Various lip techniques including full lip and gradient lip

curriculum.name: Client Management
curriculum.description: Consultation, aftercare, and managing client expectations

title.vi: Kỹ Thuật Phun Mày Kết Hợp
title.ja: コンボブロウテクニック

description.en: Combine microblading and powder for dimensional, natural brows
description.vi: Kết hợp microblading và phun phấn tạo mày tự nhiên có chiều sâu
description.ja: マイクロブレーディングとパウダーを組み合わせて立体的な眉毛を作る
description.es: Combina microblading y polvo para cejas naturales y dimensionales
description.ko: 마이크로블레이딩과 파우더를 결합한 입체적이고 자연스러운 눈썹

subtitle: Best of Both Worlds
introduction: Master the combination technique that blends hair-like strokes with soft shading for the most natural and dimensional brow results. This is the most requested brow style by clients worldwide.

curriculum.name: Technique Integration
curriculum.description: Learn when and how to combine microblading with powder shading

curriculum.name: Stroke Placement
curriculum.description: Strategic hair stroke placement for maximum natural effect

curriculum.name: Shading Methods
curriculum.description: Background shading techniques to add depth and dimension

curriculum.name: Complete Procedures
curriculum.description: Perform full combo brow procedures from start to finish

description.en: Build and grow a successful permanent makeup business
description.vi: Xây dựng và phát triển doanh nghiệp phun xăm thành công
description.ja: 成功するアートメイクビジネスを構築する
description.es: Construye y haz crecer un negocio exitoso de maquillaje permanente
description.ko: 성공적인 반영구 화장 사업을 구축하고 성장시키세요

subtitle: Turn Your Skills Into Profit
introduction: Learn the business side of PMU - from setting up your studio, pricing strategies, marketing, client retention, and scaling your business. This course is essential for artists ready to become successful entrepreneurs.

curriculum.name: Studio Setup & Licensing
curriculum.description: Legal requirements, insurance, and studio design

curriculum.name: Pricing & Packages
curriculum.description: How to price your services competitively and profitably

curriculum.name: Marketing & Branding
curriculum.description: Social media strategy, website design, and client acquisition

curriculum.name: Client Experience
curriculum.description: Consultation process, retention strategies, and referral programs
